item.description:
Boy Howdy!

How goes it, home skillets? Y'all remember my purty face? This southern belle been down crackin' whips in the Louisiana Bayou, killin' gators and riding fierce-but-lovable swamp beasties. I wusn't plannin' on stayin' long, but this swamp merman and I got a little ... personal. And I just couldn't get enuff of the grits and chicken! MMM Mmm mmm... grits.

But all good things be comin' to an end always. I mighta got a wee tiddly close to my merman and, like a corndog makin' love, I done did get her gone good 'n knocked up. A little word of advice: don't go get mermen lumpy and refried without foreseein' and expectin' consequences!

Shotgun weddings. My my my. Frightenin'! That long barrel pointin' down at my puddy face. Sweat beadin' on my brow, eyes buggin' and red. But I ran. Oh how I ran. Oh how my tuckus stung. Oh how I couldn't sit for a week.

So thass right: I be on the lamb. I ran all the way back to Baweston and here I be, orgizgonizing some ultimate doohickey. We be playin' on Cambridge Common as usual, 8 PM sharp is when you'll see my tanned hide. That there baseball diamond, a few furlongs from Hahhvard Esquire. If this be your first time a-comin', y'all shoulds probably read that there About Us section.

After we toss some doohickeys around in pitch black, we be drinkin' whiskey and starting fires around the Square. Come on by; it'll be a real southern romp!

Also, it'd be super rad if you be bringin' some cash money ($$$) for us poor originizer folk. We pay out our butts for frisbees, lanyards, smiles, rum, glowsticks, field cones, and first aid kits. If not, that's cool too: we be free, fo' life.

Y'alls could get directions to the Cambridge Common if need be. If you can't come on the back of a gator, I'd recommend the MBTA. Parkin' can be tricky for them fuel-runnin' vehicles.

If you gots any questions, I be a friendly folk and y'alls shouldn't worry 'bout comin' over to the ditch I be sleepin' in and wakin' me up.

Best be seein' you Tuesday,
Chris Croc McC + Amy "gator" Spelz.
item.name: Git down, stay down wiff some flying doohickeys this Tuesday night!
